page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {THE}area has farms,Crown estate workers and small businesses.One of which is Dean & Dawe. {Their}base is across the road from Cranbourne school in Lovel road Winkfield.They employ sixteen people and have three departments. They are photogrophs,design and studio effects. They do food packaging designs on cartons, and food packaging like boxed chicken. Usual times are nine till five thirty, but if they are doing a project they go on till eight. Customers include Woman magazine, Bejams and many National Companies. {Castle Alarms and Electronics}employ 50 people in North Street.They specialise in burglar alarms and security systems.The company is one of the leading firms in the country.
